list.title: module:common~_log
list.description: Log function, takes any number of arguments. If the first character is nonstandard and followed by a space, it'll use that as a tag

list.title: module:common~_statuslog
list.description: A bound version of _log with the tone set to "info"

list.title: module:common~compatDateObj
list.description: Converts a date string to a Date object (in a format that Safari can handle)

list.title: module:common~getFirstNonStandardCharacter
list.description: Imperfect helper for _status.log()

list.title: module:store/magic~api_get
list.description: do get request to url: API_URL + endpoint with request query of data

list.title: module:store/magic~path
list.description: get the smart text associated with a given url

list.title: module:store/magic~rated_api_get
list.description: do api_get but abide by rate limit (only eval once every 15 seconds)

list.title: module:store/magic~type
list.description: get the smart type associated with a given description

list.title: module:store/magic~type_full
list.description: get the full type name from the short type

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~clean_key
list.description: Clean up keystrings for display

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~clear
list.description: Clear all shortcuts

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~get
list.description: Get a shortcut by object

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~get_key
list.description: Get a shortcut by key

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~is_active
list.description: Check if a shortcut is active

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~list
list.description: Get a list of shortcuts

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~register
list.description: Register a new shortcut

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~register_all
list.description: Register a list of shortcuts with a given tag

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~remove
list.description: Remove a shortcut

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~remove_all
list.description: Remove all shortcuts with a given tag

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~remove_key
list.description: Remove a shortcut by key

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~remove_keys
list.description: Remove shortcuts with any of the given keys

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~remove_tag
list.description: Remove all shortcuts with a given tag

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~sections
list.description: Get a list of shortcuts by section

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~set_activity
list.description: Set the activity state of a shortcut

list.title: module:store/shortcuts~sort
list.description: Sort the shortcuts

list.title: module:store~ORG_DOMAIN
list.description: Get the domain of the organization (@domain.tld)

list.title: module:store~account_doc
list.description: The authenticated user's document from the users collection in firestore

list.title: module:store~account_ref
list.description: Get the user's absolute document reference (the signed-in account, even if it's a linked account)

list.title: module:store~actions
list.description: The actions to manipulate the store state

list.title: module:store~active_doc
list.description: Get the user's active document (the signed-in account's doc, or the linked account's if it exists)

list.title: module:store~active_ref
list.description: Get the user's active document reference (the signed-in account's doc ref, or the linked account's if it exists)

list.title: module:store~add_class
list.description: Add a class to the active user's document, and show a toast saying that the class was added

list.title: module:store~archive_task
list.description: Archive an instance of a task from a class (for teachers). Intended to be preformed from the ViewTask Modal

list.title: module:store~class_from_ref
list.description: Get the class object from a class reference

list.title: module:store~class_text
list.description: get the smart text associated with a given class

list.title: module:store~classes
list.description: Collection of the ids of classes that the user is in

list.title: module:store~clear
list.description: Reset the store state and local storage, and redirect to home if page requires auth

list.title: module:store~code_from_ref
list.description: Create a proxy code from a ref (email/uid)

list.title: module:store~create_class
list.description: Create a class with the given object, and add it to the active user's document. (for teachers)

list.title: module:store~create_doc
list.description: Create the user's document in the remote database, create a teacher document if the user is a teacher, and create a personal account if the user is using a personal account. Also preforms onboarding for non-teacher

list.title: module:store~create_task
list.description: Create a task with the given object, and add it to the classes specified in the object. (for teachers)

list.title: module:store~create_teacher_doc
list.description: Create the teacher document for the user, and redirect to the create class page

list.title: module:store~doc_from_uid
list.description: Get a user document from a uid

list.title: module:store~done_daily_survey
list.description: Check if user has completed the daily survey, or is a teacher

list.title: module:store~done_join_form
list.description: Check if user has completed the join form

list.title: module:store~done_tutorial
list.description: Check if user has completed the tutorial

list.title: module:store~fetch_classes
list.description: Fetch all classes from the user's document and combine them into an array, while checking for duplicates and invalid classes

list.title: module:store~fetch_classes_by_email
list.description: Fetch all classes for a given email, and set the loaded classes to the result

list.title: module:store~finish_tutorial
list.description: Set the user's tutorial status to finished

list.title: module:store~finished_tasks
list.description: return all the finished tasks

list.title: module:store~get_cached_surveys
list.description: Get the survey data for the given dates for this user, using the cached data in the active doc. If the data does not include the given dates, get the data from the server and save it to use as the cashe

list.title: module:store~get_loaded_classes
list.description: Get the classes that have been loaded for the loaded_email, and set the .is_joined property on each

list.title: module:store~get_remote
list.description: Get the user's document from the remote database, and create it if it doesn't exist. Preforms additional checks for personal accounts, and removes the linked account if it doesn't exist

list.title: module:store~get_surveys
list.description: Get the survey data for the given dates for this user

list.title: module:store~get_tasks
list.description: Get all tasks from all classes

list.title: module:store~get_theme
list.description: Get theme from local storage or user doc

list.title: module:store~getters
list.description: The getters to get data that's based off of the store state, but requires manipulation

list.title: module:store~hide_timeout
list.description: Hide the popup saying that the session has timed out

list.title: module:store~invite_linked
list.description: Invite a user account to link to another user's account (for personal accounts only,) including sending them an email with the code to join

list.title: module:store~is_teacher
list.description: Check if user is a teacher, or is in teacher mode locally (for testing)

list.title: module:store~link_account_uid
list.description: Link a user account to another user's account by uid (for personal accounts only)

list.title: module:store~linked_account_doc
list.description: The linked account document from the users collection in firestore

list.title: module:store~linked_account_ref
list.description: Get the user's linked account document reference (the account that the user is linked to, if it exists)

list.title: module:store~linked_accounts
list.description: Get all linked accounts from active_doc.linked

list.title: module:store~loaded_classes
list.description: The classes that have been loaded for the loaded_email (for previews in AddClass.vue)

list.title: module:store~loaded_email
list.description: The email of the user that the classes have been loaded for (for previews in AddClass.vue)

list.title: module:store~login
list.description: Log the user in with Google OAuth (using the appropriate prompt type based on window support), and set the user object.

list.title: module:store~login_personal
list.description: Most things that login() does, but for personal accounts (does not preform org account check, enforce sign-in domain, or redirect)

list.title: module:store~login_promise
list.description: A wrapper for the store.user state, to wait for the user to be set

list.title: module:store~logout
list.description: Log the user out and clear the store state

list.title: module:store~logout_prompt
list.description: If the app is showing a logout prompt (true) or not (false)

list.title: module:store~non_recent_signin
list.description: Check if user signed in within the last 24 hours

list.title: module:store~note_for
list.description: Get the note for the given ref

list.title: module:store~notes
list.description: return all the notes in a dictionary with the ref as the key

list.title: module:store~path_to_ref
list.description: Convert a path to a ref (email~class_id?~task_id)

list.title: module:store~paused
list.description: If the app is paused (true) or not (false)

list.title: module:store~personal_account
list.description: If the user is using their personal account (true) or a valid org account (false)

list.title: module:store~recently_joined
list.description: Check if user joined within the last 12 hours

list.title: module:store~ref_from_code
list.description: Get the ref (email/uid) from a code

list.title: module:store~ref_to_path
list.description: Convert a ref to a path (email/class_id?/task_id)

list.title: module:store~refresh_timeout
list.description: A proxy for the refreshTimeout function in firebase.js (to reduce unnecessary onSnapshot calls)

list.title: module:store~remove_class
list.description: Remove a class from the active user's document, and show a toast saying that the class was removed manually

list.title: module:store~remove_class_id_helper
list.description: Helper function to remove a class from the active user's document and save changes to remote

list.title: module:store~remove_invalid
list.description: Remove a class from the active user's document, and show a toast saying that the class was removed because it was invalid

list.title: module:store~save_daily_survey
list.description: Save the responses from the daily survey to the active user's document

list.title: module:store~save_join_form
list.description: Save the responses from the join form to the active user's document

list.title: module:store~set pref
list.description: Set a preference in the account doc

list.title: module:store~set_account_pref
list.description: Set a preference in the account doc

list.title: module:store~set_active
list.description: Set the active document (the signed-in account's doc, or the linked account's if it exists) to the provided document

list.title: module:store~set_finished
list.description: set a task with the given ref to finished in the finished array of the active doc (remove if finished is false, add path if finished is true)

list.title: module:store~set_note
list.description: set a task with the given path to have a note in the keyed "notes" property of the active doc (remove if value is falsey, add note if truthy)

list.title: module:store~set_user
list.description: Set the user object and load the user's document, with some additional checks and error handling. Also set the user's document if it exists, or create it if it doesn't, and logs them out if the account is deemed invalid

list.title: module:store~show_timeout
list.description: Show a popup saying that the session has timed out

list.title: module:store~simplified
list.description: Get if the user is using a simplified view (true) or not (false)

list.title: module:store~state
list.description: Function to create a clean store state, used for initialization. Will attempt to load from window.localStorage variable to save on firebase calls -> isn't always stable after app update that changes state keyings

list.title: module:store~task_from_ref
list.description: Get the task object from a task reference

list.title: module:store~tasks
list.description: Collection of the processed task objects

list.title: module:store~teacher
list.description: The teacher object, with doc_ref and collection_ref

list.title: module:store~theme
list.description: The theme of the app, either "light" or "dark"

list.title: module:store~toggle_teacher
list.description: Toggle teacher mode (for testing)

list.title: module:store~toggle_theme
list.description: Toggle the theme between light and dark, and save to local storage and user account doc

list.title: module:store~uninvite_linked
list.description: Unlink a user account from another user's account (for personal accounts only)

list.title: module:store~upcoming
list.description: et the upcoming tasks (after 8AM today)

list.title: module:store~upcoming_from_ref
list.description: Get the next 4 upcoming task objects for a given class reference

list.title: module:store~upcoming_todo
list.description: Get the upcoming tasks (after 8AM today) that havent been marked as done

list.title: module:store~update_class
list.description: Update an instance of a class (for teachers). Intended to be preformed from the EditClass Modal

list.title: module:store~update_remote
list.description: Update the active user's document in the remote database

list.title: module:store~update_task
list.description: Update an instance of a task from a class (for teachers). Intended to be preformed from the EditTask Modal

list.title: module:store~update_wrapper_acc_doc
list.description: Update the authenticated user's document in the remote database (for personal accounts only)

list.title: module:store~update_wrapper_acc_doc
list.description: Update the authenticated user's document in the remote database with the data given (for personal accounts only)

list.title: module:store~user
list.description: The user object from firebase auth

list.title: store/index.js
list.description: store/index.js
